# Its Nikki!!!!

Library packages
```{R, Message = FALSE}
library(ggplot2)
library(tidyverse)
```

```{R}
candyear <- candidates %>%
  select(-cand_id, -cand_office, -cand_office_district, -cand_ici, -cand_status, -cand_pcc, -cand_st1, -cand_st2, -cand_city, -cand_state) %>%
  filter(cand_election_yr == 2012) %>%
  filter(cand_party_affiliation %in% c("DEM", "REP"))
```


```{r}
candMA <- candyear %>%
  filter(cand_office_state == "MA")
```
